release_notes.en:
## üöÄ Performance Optimization Update - v2.1.5

### üîÑ Smart Connect Improvements
‚Ä¢ **Optimized Server Selection** - Faster and more reliable server connection process
‚Ä¢ **Parallel Server Testing** - Multiple servers checked simultaneously for better speed
‚Ä¢ **Enhanced Error Recovery** - Better handling of connection failures and retries
‚Ä¢ **Improved IP Detection** - More reliable country and server status detection

### üîß Technical Optimizations
‚Ä¢ **Multi-Server Configuration** - Support for testing multiple servers in parallel
‚Ä¢ **Enhanced V2Ray Integration** - Better handling of V2Ray configuration and status
‚Ä¢ **Improved TLS Handling** - More reliable TLS connections with proper SNI support
‚Ä¢ **Memory Usage Optimization** - Reduced memory footprint during server operations

### üåü User Experience Enhancements
‚Ä¢ **Faster Connection Times** - Reduced delay when switching between servers
‚Ä¢ **Better Status Feedback** - More accurate connection status information
‚Ä¢ **Improved Stability** - More reliable overall VPN operation
‚Ä¢ **Resource Efficiency** - Lower CPU and memory usage

**Faster, more stable VPN with optimized performance! üöÄ**

install_instructions.en: Download APK file and allow installation from unknown sources in your device settings. Uninstall the previous version completely before installing.
Update will be available through Google Play Store. Tap the button to open the store page.
Download DMG file with auto-installer. Follow the installation wizard instructions.
Update will be available through Mac App Store.

release_notes.en:
## Important Update Instructions for v2.1.4+07281738

### üö® Important: Manual Update Required
‚Ä¢ **Uninstall Previous Version** - Please uninstall the old version completely before installing the new one.
‚Ä¢ **Download New Version** - Get the latest APK from [this link](https://github.com/Romaxa55/MegaV_Public/releases/tag/v2.1.4).
‚Ä¢ **Auto-Update Not Functional** - Automatic updates are currently not working, manual installation is required.

### üîã Battery Life Optimization + V2Ray Parser Enhancement - v2.1.4

### üö´ Disabled Automatic Server Checks
‚Ä¢ **No More Background Ping Tests** - Eliminated automatic server checking every 30 seconds
‚Ä¢ **Removed Splash Screen Checks** - No more server preload checks after splash
‚Ä¢ **Manual Check Only** - Server status checks now only happen when user requests them
‚Ä¢ **Battery Savings** - Significantly reduced CPU usage and network activity
‚Ä¢ **Faster App Launch** - No more waiting for background server operations

### üåê Updated Server Source
‚Ä¢ **New Server Repository** - Updated to use our own server list: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Romaxa55/MegaV_Public/refs/heads/main/servers.txt
‚Ä¢ **Reliable Source** - Direct control over server quality and availability
‚Ä¢ **Better Performance** - Faster server loading from our optimized repository
‚Ä¢ **Consistent Updates** - Regular server list updates from our team

### üöÄ Enhanced V2Ray Configuration Parser
‚Ä¢ **Native Go Parser Integration** - Added support for official v2ray-checker library parsing
‚Ä¢ **Dual Parser System** - Native Go parser with manual fallback for maximum compatibility
‚Ä¢ **VLESS Protocol Support** - Full support for VLESS servers with proper TLS handling
‚Ä¢ **Shadowsocks Validation** - Smart filtering of unsupported cipher methods
‚Ä¢ **Better Error Handling** - Graceful fallback when native parser fails
‚Ä¢ **Server Auto-switching** - Automatic switch to alternative servers for unsupported ciphers

### üõ†Ô∏è Code Quality Improvements
‚Ä¢ **Zero Dart Warnings** - Fixed all compilation errors and analyzer warnings
‚Ä¢ **Null Safety Compliance** - Proper null-aware operators and safety checks
‚Ä¢ **Clean Code Structure** - Removed unused methods, variables, and imports
‚Ä¢ **Better Memory Management** - Optimized variable usage and resource handling
‚Ä¢ **Professional Codebase** - Production-ready code with best practices

### üîß Technical Improvements
‚Ä¢ **Cleaner Code** - Removed unused background check fields and methods
‚Ä¢ **Optimized Resource Usage** - Better memory management and CPU efficiency
‚Ä¢ **Manual Control** - Users can still check servers manually via UI buttons
‚Ä¢ **No Automatic Drain** - App no longer drains battery with background operations
‚Ä¢ **Server Management** - Added unmarkServerAsBad functionality for server rehabilitation
‚Ä¢ **VPN State Provider** - New VpnState class with ChangeNotifier for better state management
‚Ä¢ **Enhanced Geolocation** - Better country detection and server naming
‚Ä¢ **Improved Parsing Logic** - More robust URL parsing with multiple fallback methods
‚Ä¢ **TLS Configuration** - Proper SNI, Host, and Address priority handling

### üì± Enhanced User Experience
‚Ä¢ **Longer Battery Life** - Significantly reduced power consumption
‚Ä¢ **Faster App Response** - No background operations blocking UI
‚Ä¢ **Manual Server Checks** - Users control when to check server status
‚Ä¢ **Better Performance** - Smoother app operation on older devices
‚Ä¢ **Resource Efficient** - Optimized for mobile devices with limited resources
‚Ä¢ **Parser Stability** - More reliable server configuration generation
‚Ä¢ **Error Recovery** - Improved error handling with automatic fallbacks

**Battery-friendly VPN with enhanced V2Ray parsing and production-ready code! üîãüîß**

release_notes.en:
## üé® Split Tunneling UI Enhancements - v2.1.2

### ‚ú® Improved User Experience
‚Ä¢ **Adaptive Font Scaling** - Perfect text size on all devices, even with accessibility settings
‚Ä¢ **Redesigned Action Buttons** - Clear 'VPN ON' and 'VPN OFF' labels instead of confusing text
‚Ä¢ **Smart Popular Badges** - Repositioned to top-right corner with proper text wrapping
‚Ä¢ **Compact Interface** - Smaller switches and icons for modern, clean look
‚Ä¢ **Better Text Handling** - Auto-ellipsis for long app names and descriptions

### üîß Technical Improvements
‚Ä¢ **Matrix-Based Sizing** - All elements now follow adaptive layout standards
‚Ä¢ **System Font Scaling Fix** - LimitedScaleWrapper prevents UI breaking with large fonts
‚Ä¢ **Optimized Statistics Display** - Multi-language support with automatic text wrapping
‚Ä¢ **Cleaner Interface** - Removed unclear cache button, kept intuitive refresh only
‚Ä¢ **Professional Layout** - Consistent spacing and proportions across all screen sizes

### üåç Better Accessibility
‚Ä¢ Works perfectly with large system fonts
‚Ä¢ Improved contrast and readability
‚Ä¢ Touch targets optimized for all users
‚Ä¢ Multi-language text wrapping support

**Enhanced Split Tunneling experience with professional UI! üöÄ**

release_notes.en:
## üöÄ What's New in v2.1.1 - First Auto-Update Release!

### üÜï Revolutionary Auto-Update System
‚Ä¢ **Smart Auto-Updates** - App automatically checks and notifies about new versions
‚Ä¢ **Beautiful Update Dialog** - Modern UI with progress indicators and BETA badges
‚Ä¢ **Rollout Control** - Gradual release system with user distribution
‚Ä¢ **Download Progress** - Real-time download status with beautiful animations
‚Ä¢ **Installation Guides** - Step-by-step instructions for each platform

### ‚ú® Enhanced User Experience
‚Ä¢ **BETA Badge Support** - Clear identification of pre-release versions
‚Ä¢ **Multi-language Support** - Update notifications in your language
‚Ä¢ **Smart Error Handling** - Better feedback when updates fail
‚Ä¢ **Adaptive UI** - Perfect sizing on all screen sizes

### üîß Technical Improvements
‚Ä¢ **Modern Flutter Code** - Updated to latest APIs and best practices
‚Ä¢ **Zero Dart Warnings** - Clean, production-ready codebase
‚Ä¢ **Enhanced Security** - Proper BuildContext safety and memory management
‚Ä¢ **Performance Optimized** - Faster app startup and smoother animations

**This is the FIRST release with auto-update support! üéâ**
release_notes.ru:
## üöÄ Что нового в версии 2.1.1 - Первый релиз с автообновлениями!

### üÜï Революционная система автообновлений
‚Ä¢ **Умные автообновления** - Приложение автоматически проверяет и уведомляет о новых версиях
‚Ä¢ **Красивый диалог обновлений** - Современный интерфейс с индикаторами прогресса и BETA бейджами
‚Ä¢ **Контроль выкатки** - Постепенная система релизов с распределением пользователей
‚Ä¢ **Прогресс загрузки** - Статус загрузки в реальном времени с красивыми анимации
‚Ä¢ **Инструкции установки** - Пошаговые руководства для каждой платформы

### ‚ú® Улучшенный пользовательский опыт
‚Ä¢ **Поддержка BETA бейджей** - Чёткое обозначение предварительных версий
‚Ä¢ **Многоязычная поддержка** - Уведомления об обновлениях на вашем языке
‚Ä¢ **Умная обработка ошибок** - Лучшая обратная связь при сбоях обновлений
‚Ä¢ **Адаптивный интерфейс** - Идеальное отображение на всех размерах экранов

### üîß Технические улучшения
‚Ä¢ **Современный код Flutter** - Обновлено до последних API и лучших практик
‚Ä¢ **Ноль предупреждений Dart** - Чистый, готовый к продакшену код
‚Ä¢ **Повышенная безопасность** - Правильная работа с BuildContext и управление памятью
‚Ä¢ **Оптимизированная производительность** - Быстрый запуск и плавные анимации

**Это ПЕРВЫЙ релиз с поддержкой автообновлений! üéâ**
